summary: Email correspondence between legal or law enforcement personnel regarding a draft application for an amended search warrant to correct FBI barcode numbers for three devices seized from Jeffrey Epstein's New York residence. The email also mentions an ongoing image review with a deadline.

events.title: Seizure of Devices from Epstein's NY Residence
events.description: Three devices were seized from Jeffrey Epstein's New York residence, as referenced in the context of correcting their FBI barcode numbers via an amended search warrant application.

events.title: Draft Application for Amended Search Warrant
events.description: A draft application for an amended search warrant was prepared and attached in an email to correct the FBI barcode numbers for three devices seized from Epstein's NY residence.

keyFacts: Three devices were seized from Jeffrey Epstein's New York residence.
An amended search warrant application was being prepared to correct the FBI barcode numbers for those three seized devices.
An image review related to the case was underway and needed to be completed by a deadline.
The correspondence indicates ongoing investigative activity regarding evidence from Epstein's residence in October 2020.
